argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_distop | |- ( A e. V -> ~P A e. Top ) |
| 2 |  | #P_unipw | |- U. ~P A = A |
| 3 | 2 | #P_eqcomi | |- A = U. ~P A |
| 4 | 3 | #P_a1i | |- ( A e. V -> A = U. ~P A ) |
| 5 |  | #P_istopon | |- ( ~P A e. ( TopOn ` A ) <-> ( ~P A e. Top /\ A = U. ~P A ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 4, 5 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( A e. V -> ~P A e. ( TopOn ` A ) ) |
